original: 東吳武將。陸遜擊敗關羽，奪得荊州後，謝旌與李異率三千兵攻蜀，敗詹晏、鄧輔、郭睦等人，並俘虜陳鳳。後又隨陸遜戰勝文布、鄧凱。
text: Dongwu generals. After Lu Xun defeated Guan Yu and captured Jingzhou, Xie Jing and Li Yi attacked Shu with three thousand troops, defeated Zhan Yan, Deng Fu, Guo Mu and others, and captured Chen Feng. Then he defeated Wenbu and Deng Kai with Lu Xun.
